channel.title: The Knight Of Kitchen Sink
channel.description: Recent content on The Knight Of Kitchen Sink

item.title: Holiday
item.description: My brother went to a clinic. My father worked at a company. My mother is great woman because three sons will be right. My sister is you! Who am I? Yes, Sir.Mouri! This is not a detective, maybe a …, comics? Now Okay, he seems to be a “Peter Pan”. My wendy’s voices are often nurse my bodies… (What is your favotite comics? I like “Bagabond”, “Cooking Papa”, and “City Hunter”)

item.title: GreenLeaf
item.description: “Hagakure”

item.title: ForgottenMemory
item.description: My memories were often on the brakes.

item.title: EarthWind
item.description: “A fair wind or a head wind.” I was sometimes against global rules… I’m sorry and sad.

item.title: SpringTyphoon
item.description: Oh my god… The gods are very angry, I felt so.

item.title: Christmas
item.description: I went to Kyoto, Osaka. There were a lot of special places. I respect western cultures in Japan. Thanks.

item.title: FineIs
item.description: I will be fine. “Weather Report” They are applications(especially iOS or Android). (I was engaged of weather information notification sevices, so I was a engineer of software development). Otherwise, I like music, “Foo Fighters” It’s band is very cool. “I don’t wanna be your monkey wrench” Thanks.

item.title: BetaRabbit
item.description: [Question] Hello, my blog readers. When did they cause the problems? This is my question. They need somebody’s love, money, drinks, and the cooking foods. Please ask me, “Hey, Siri”. [Answer] Your hope is happy ending. My name is secret.(BigSir)

item.title: GanmaMail
item.description: [Question] Hello, my blog readers. We have to think about our health. Runnning, Walking, Gymnastics, Swimming and Muscle Training. Mind, Body, and Technic. You know the sports called “Bukatsu”. Please call me, “Please be cool at the time, concentrate”. [Answer] I was a poor man such as a gambler. I am a nutrients by the big plant called “Yggdrasill”.(This is not a real story.)

item.title: RainIs
item.description: Like a love in desert. Like an anger to the river. Like a sadness on missing you. Like a joy at silent night. Please be kind, I like it.

item.title: LightningThunder
item.description: The “Signal” I think so.

item.title: EveryThreeDays
item.description: “A Three Day’s Bonze”

item.title: AlphaMonkey
item.description: [Question] Hello, my blog readers. Today is “July and September” in the world. The summer is already end, we must walk around the city or forests… Which did you choice the way? This is my question. You need somebody’s a little love, a little money, many drinks, and many foods and sakes. Please ask me, “Hello, Dr.Kraft”. [Answer] Our hopes are good endings. Your name is secret.(Of course a reader)

item.title: LambdaCar
item.description: Hello, my blog readers. Bitcoin will raise a price from 2020 autumn, we have to be cure… Who is the coin maker? This is my question. The coins need somebody’s virtual love, real money, bloody drinks, and the cooking foods. Please ask me, “Excuse me, Mrs.M?” [Answer] Their hopes are special ending. Their names are secret.(Of course, only the gods know)

item.title: HungryBird
item.description: [Question] Hello, my blog readers. Tokyo 2020 Olympic will come, we will go to the next stage… What is your important thing? This is my question. I need somebody’s love, money, drinks, and the cooking foods. Please help me, “OK, Google”. [Answer] My hope is to meet a girl. Her name is secret.

item.title: FireWorks
item.description: The “Hanabi”

item.title: NewDays
item.description: Today, I went to a shrine. There are the gods, I believe. Thank you for reading.

item.title: AprilFool
item.description: “I’m sorry, I forgot important things.” In Japan, April is start of school, company, and so on. I will talk to you. (contain a lie) I don’t know why. Of course, the jokes are very good. But I think honest is “sometimes” good thing, not always. I will try to answer, but no one believe it… Why not? Maybe, the age. I am a poor man such as a playing UNO with my friends.

item.title: EconomicMan
item.description: [Question] Hello, my blog readers. Today is “The War End” in our history. Money wars caused by mind from weather and status, we try to be keep our mind. How do you do? This is my question. The spokesman need somebody’s much love, much money, cold drinks, and the hot cooking foods. Please ask me, “Shall we dance?” [Answer] Anybody’s hope is not happy ending. Their names are secret.(Of course, only you know)

item.title: Encryption
item.description: “Secret and Privacy”

item.title: EmptyDumpty
item.description: I was in my apartment three days. I made the software, but last scene was never come… An electric information was delete from our memories. You can write to the paper. Please don’t be a slave of computers, please. Before Okay? I never know. Thanks.
